channel.title: I need a lot of help
channel.description:
I'm trying to make a server/client/whathaveyou, and I'm not doing a very good job. I'm running into a lot of problems.
1) When I hit "run" on it, I get the message: "The system could not find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: net/com/canownueasy/Server ...." and a lot more Java stuff
2) Sometimes I get the "Java is not recognized as a internal or external source" Or something like that, I don't remember exactly what it says.
PLEASE, if anyone could help, I'd be EXTREMELY greatful. thanks :)

item.title: I need a lot of help
item.dc:creator: @Austin543215 Austin543215
item.description:
@Austin543215 wrote:

I’m trying to make a server/client/whathaveyou, and I’m not doing a very good job.
I’m running into a lot of problems.

  1. When I hit “run” on it, I get the message:
    “The system could not find the path specified.
    Exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: net/com/canownueasy/Server …” and a lot more Java stuff

  2. Sometimes I get the “Java is not recognized as a internal or external source” Or something like that, I don’t remember exactly what it says.

PLEASE, if anyone could help, I’d be EXTREMELY greatful.
thanks
